item.title: Exact Truthmakers
item.description: Unpublished Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: logic conditionals Unpublished manuscript https://www.academia.edu/42813176/Two_Switches_and_Truthmaker_Semantics The Whole Truth Stephan Krämer Formulates an account of what it means to give the “whole truth” and formally models it in exact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: philosophy language applications In: Outstanding Contributions to Logic: Kit Fine, edited by Federico LG Faroldi and Frederik Van De Putte.

item.title: Exact Truthmakers
item.description: Unpublished Two-Dimensional Truthmaker Semantics Hasen Khudairi Extends the framework of exact truthmaker semantics with the resources of two-dimensional semantics. Keywords: applications modality exact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://philarchive.org/archive/KHUTTS-2 Disjunctive Parts Mark Jago Further refines ideas of (Jago 2020) in the context of the relation of disjunctive parts (in contrast to the concept of conjunctive parts discussed, e.g., in (Fine 2016)). Keywords: exact truthmaking In: Outstanding Contributions to Logic: Kit Fine, edited by Federico LG Faroldi and Frederik Van De Putte.

item.title: Archive
item.description: The Truthmaker Semantics Workshop Wednesday, December 11, 2019 Amsterdam Science Park, ILLC, Room F1.15 http://projects.illc.uva.nl/conceivability/Events/event/42/Truthmakers-Semantics-Workshop Truthmaker Semantics. Applications in Philosophy and Linguistics Monday, July 29, 2019 — Wednesday, July 31, 2019 Truthmaker semantics deviates from the familiar framework of possible world semantics in two fundamental and related ways. First, the notion of a possible world is replaced by a more general notion of a state that applies to any fragment of a world.

item.title: Background
item.description: 2016 Hyperintensionality Iliana Gioulatou Compares various accounts of hyperintensional content. Ch. 5 contains a discussion of Fine’s approach. Keywords: philosophy exact truthmaking theory Master’s thesis at University of Amsterdam, Institute for Logic, Language,; Computation. http://www.illc.uva.nl/Research/Publications/Reports/MoL-2016-24.text.pdf 2013 Recent Work in Relevant Logic Mark Jago Contains a brief discussion of truthmakers and their relation to relevant logic (Restall 1996). Keywords: logic relevance logic theory In: Analysis 73: 526-541 10.

item.title: Conditionals
item.description: Unpublished Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: exact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://www.academia.edu/42813176/Two_Switches_and_Truthmaker_Semantics Or-to-if Inferences in Contextualist Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Discusses or-to-if inferences in the semantics developed in (Güngör 2017 and 2019c). Keywords: exact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://www.

item.title: Exact Truthmakers
item.description: Unpublished Two Switches and Truthmaker Semantics Hüseyin Güngör Analyses the Two Stitches puzzle from Ciardelli, Champollion, and Zhang using Fine’s exact truthmaker semantics for counterfactuals from (Fine 2012b) Keywords: conditionals Unpublished manuscript https://www.academia.edu/42813176/Two_Switches_and_Truthmaker_Semantics The Whole Truth Stephan Krämer Formulates an account of what it means to give the “whole truth” and formally models it in exact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: philosophy language applications logic In: Outstanding Contributions to Logic: Kit Fine, edited by Federico LG Faroldi and Frederik Van De Putte.

item.title: Inexact Truthmakers
item.description: 2021 Routley Star and Hyperintensionality Sergei Odintsov and Heinrich Wansing Compares HYPE to Heyting-Ockam logic. Contains a characterization of HYPE as identical to a modal system introduced by Moisil. From the perspective of truthmaker semantics, these results can be understood as results about (a certain kind of) inexact truthmaker semantics. Keywords: logic modality theory In: Journal of Philosophical Logic 50: 33-56 10.1007/s10992-020-09558-5 2020 Truthmaker Semantics for Relevant Logic Mark Jago Presents an exact truthmaker semantics for the relevance logic <b>R</b>.

From the perspective of truthmaker semantics, these results can be understood as results about (a certain kind of) inexact truthmaker semantics.
